Room.Name: Reference Desk
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a plainly designed room with a number of scrolls pinned up along the walls. It looks like most of these scrolls are falling apart.
Room.LongDescription: The reference desk contains a number of scrolls that are used to locate objects or provide information on certain items. These scrolls, collected through the ages, date back to as early as the dragon scrolls of the Dragon's Citadel. No doubt, there will be quite a bit of interesting material in here.
